title: Definitions
context: [ยง188F-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise: &ldquo;Department&rdquo; means the department of land and natural resources. &ldquo;Management area&rdquo; means the West Hawaii regional fishery management area established in section 188F-2. &ldquo;Plan&rdquo; means the West Hawaii regional fishery management area plan established in section 188F-4. [L 1998, c 306, pt of ยง2]
